Classes

class  FsPath
 A class for working with richer filepaths than just a string. APT would like to be able to name where to read and write data. when there was just one dataset per file the filename was sufficient to to do this. The dataset name was simply mapped into the file system. Now things are more complicated. A file can contain several datasets. More...
